title: Where's My Son?
description:
"GRIPPING STORY ABOUT A PARENT'S WORST NIGHTMARE.""COULDN'T PUT IT DOWN. ACTION PACKED FROM BEGINNING TO END."*************************************WHAT WOULD YOU DO IF YOUR SON WENT MISSING? HOW FAR WOULD YOU GO TO FIND HIM? Michael Barton comes home to find his infant son gone. Detective Jason Strong leads the task force to find Michael's son, and they become friends. So as Michael's darkness grows, Jason realizes he's the only one who can stop the looming events that threaten to change everyone forever.***************************************THE FIRST 10 JASON BOOKS IN ONE SET- JUST 2.99***************************MORE FROM JOHN C. DALGLISH****************************THE CITY MURDERS SERIES(Clean Suspense)BOSTON HOMICIDE - #1MIAMI HOMICIDE - #2CHICAGO HOMICIDE - #3DALLAS HOMICIDE - #4DENVER HOMICIDE - #5SEATTLE HOMICIDE - #6NEW ORLEANS HOMICIDE - #7MEMPHIS HOMICIDE - #8ATLANTA HOMICIDE - #9PHOENIX HOMICIDE - #10CHARLESTON HOMICIDE - #11
